changes: 2.7 Outdoors Update Has Arrived! This Update includes New Hunting Script, New Fishing Script, Cooking Update w/new buffs, New pickable plants [Herbs], Treasure Maps, Reworked Treasure Chests, New Trucking Job, New Boats, New Gang War System
Moved the death message from bottom to the top of the screen
Fixed the scrapyard email
Fixed a bug that regened health after a command
PD Updated pushed Divisions are live
Added City Cam Access to Rockford hills pd
Added improved PD Heli Cam w/Spotlight
Lowered garage transfer fee by 50%
Pushed Hotfixes for car boosting
Crafting benches xp has been completely reworked and buffed after tons of feedback almost 10x more xp gains
Crafting will be monitored after these changes and may be altered more in the future, your honest feedback will be greatly appreciated
Fixed 10-99 for PD
Added sounds for 10-99 alerts for PD
Added the 2 new MLO'S for PD, Rockford Hills PD and the Paleto Bay Sheriff's Office
Added 2 new cars to PD Garages
Added boat PD Garages
Changed loading screen images order
Replaced sling script with a new one
Updated the pause menu, new logo, new colors and new tebex button!
Now if you are not on your side or on your back while getting cuffed you will recieve a skillcheck and if you do it right you escape from cuffs!
Fixed radio exploits
Now while holding a knife you can third eye car tires and slash them!
Reworked and optimize the tackle, now the default button is G and you can change it as you wish in the keybindings!
When you die or get cuffed you now get kicked out of radio
Fixed the spam of the disable radio when you die
Fixed Airdrops
Moved the death message from bottom to the top of the screen
